item.description:
Come join Things To Do Boston on Sunday, November 23rd at Game On for a once in a lifetime opportunity to take some swings in the batting cages at Fenway Park.

Fenway has been an institution in Boston since 1912 and now you can see a side of the park that only the players see.

We will be taking some batting practice in the cages that are located beneath the center field bleachers. We will start at 11am and run until 1pm. Please arrive 15 minutes early so that we can start on time and give everyone an opportunity to hit.

Afterward we will grab some food and drinks while watching the Patriots in our private sky box at Game On. (Food will be included in the price of the event and there will be a cash bar available.)

Don’t miss out - space is limited – sign up today!
Go to www.thingstodoboston.com
Click on the Event Calendar (on the left side of the page)
Purchase your ticket for only $40!
item.name: Fenway Batting Cages and Patriots game at Game On!
